body:
I finally got the runtime multi-cpu tests to pass after that last timeout bump:

```
--- PASS: TestGostringnocopy-4 (0.00s)
=== RUN TestCaller-4
--- PASS: TestCaller-4 (0.01s)
--- PASS: TestStackGrowthCallback-4 (0.91s)
--- PASS: TestStackGrowth-4 (1.17s)
PASS
ok  	runtime	493.492s
```

So 8.2 minutes is the magic number, not 8 minutes.  :-)
